data.title: Philippines: National Capital Region (NCR) Profile (4 Dec 2015) - Philippines
data.meta_description: Infographic in English on Philippines about Agriculture, Education, Flood, Land Slide and more; published on 4 Dec 2015 by OCHA
data.text:
Attachments

Download Infographic (PDF | 1.26 MB)

National Capital Region (NCR) otherwise known as Metropolitan Manila is composed of 16 cities and 1 municipality grouped into 4 districts. It is the premier urban region and considered to be the political, economic and social center of the Philippines. NCR is the smallest and most densely populated region in the country. It is bordred by Region 3 in the north and Region 4A in the south and east. Manila Bay lies to the west and Laguna de Bay to the south-east.
